Test Name: Focused Autosomal Dominant Polycystic Kidney Disease (ADPKD) Gene Panel
Purpose: To detect genetic variants associated with Autosomal Dominant Polycystic Kidney Disease by analyzing targeted ADPKD genes.
Container: EDTA tube for blood or approved saliva collection kit
Equipment: Centrifuge, thermal cycler, gel electrophoresis apparatus, DNA sequencer, micropipettes, vortex mixer
